(Retrieved,1)
("http,1)
(//en,1)
(wiktionary,1)
(org/wiki/Wiktionary,1)
(Frequency_lists/PG/,1)
(/,2)
(g():,1)
(file('big.txt').read(),1)
(N,1)
(len(big),1)
(set(),1)
(xrange(6,,1)
(N):,1)
(big[i],1)
(ord(c),1)
(>,1)
(s:,1)
(i,,1)
(c,,1)
(ord(c),,1)
(big[max(0,,1)
(i-10):min(N,,1)
(i+10)],1)
(s.add(c),1)
([ord(c),1)
(s],1)
